column1: The current minimum wage in Russia is RUB16,242.00 per month in 2023. It became valid on January 1, 2023.
The amounts are in Russian Ruble.
St Petersburg Federal City - for commercial firms
St Petersburg Federal City - for public servants
Tomsk Region - In Bakchar, Krivosheinsky, Molchanovsky and Teguldet districts
Ulyanovsk Region - for public servants and small businesses
Yamalo-Nenets Autonomous Region - for commercial firms
Yamalo-Nenets Autonomous Region - for public servants
